programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Iris, Basti, and Ali put aside their differences and work together to make Ali’s event a success. Soon, the three get the chance to talk and resolve their issues.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Following Marcial's command, Jessie verifies David Pascal's hideout. She immediately alerts Ethan after confirming the location of the wanted terrorist. The soldiers then tail David in hopes of finding the warehouse of the smuggled weapons.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian's anonymous tip proves fruitful as Pascal finally falls into the hands of Ethan and his comrades. However, Franco manages to elude Ethan's grasp. After another thwarted mission, Franco shares with Tiago his suspicion that there is a traitor within their ranks.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: After receiving an anonymous tip about a vital piece of evidence connected to her rape case, Romina is determined to get it. Kulas, on the other hand, grows anxious as he finds out that the police are now after his accomplice who handled Romina’s case. He then warns Police Officer Presto to lay low. Later on, the Mondragons finally meet one of the men who abducted Marga and Cassie. Having had enough of Marga's bullying, Cassie decides to fight back.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Bent on attaining justice, Romina presses Mark to reveal the mastermind behind Marga and Cassie’s abduction. However, her relentless pursuit of the truth hits a bump in the road when she learns about the suspect’s fate. In an unexpected turn of events, Romina receives an intriguing offer from an anonymous caller. Meanwhile, Marga instigates another fight between her and Cassie. Fed up, the young Mondragon resolves to fight back.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Jenna pretends to make amends with Aryann while she plots to win back her family. Waldo conducts his investigation and finds out who the culprit is behind the company's recent scandal. A group of men assault Aryann.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Waldo resolves to reveal his past with Aryann to Tristan for the sake of his principles before leaving the company. Jenna discovers the truth about the former lovers.

programme.title: Talk Back and You're Dead
programme.desc: A model student finds herself entangled in a relationship with a delinquent gang leader. Her perfect life is soon thrown into chaos, even as she finds a measure of happiness in the romance.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: Delighted that she has decided to stay in the country for good, Paco asks Anna to continue their romance. He also learns of a discovery she made, which made her commit to being involved in the investigation. Soon after, Anna tries to get more information from her family about their past.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Franco tries his best to rectify the screw-up at the Gift for a Cause Bazaar. Unbeknownst to him, Rhian is tailing his movements. Later on, Corazon and Amelia cross paths at the same event. Upon receiving a tip from Jessie, Ethan and his unit also head to the bazaar. Jessie, likewise, unearths one of Corazon's secrets.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian hatches up a plan after finding Tiago's drugs smuggled in the teddy bears that are sold at the Gifts for a Cause Bazaar. To assist her in locating the other toys at the event, she reaches out to Corazon. Franco, likewise, enlists Ivan's help after his operation went south due to the de Leons' interference. Amelia alerts Tiago afterward of the progress of his operation. With Rhian garnering his full attention, Tiago decides to hit back.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: After encountering Ethan at the bazaar, Amelia tells one of her minions to be vigilant for military presence. Upon noticing something strange while strolling around the bazaar with Isabelle and Elai, Corazon gets captured by Tiago's henchmen. While searching for a place to hide the bag full of drugs, Rhian receives a call from Tiago and learns about her mother's situation. Arriving in time for their operation, Greg orders Ethan to lead the army troops to capture their suspects.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: The military finds itself in a predicament as they try to resolve the hostage-taking situation. Wanting to aid the operation, Marcial offers valuable advice to Gen. Maximillano. Meanwhile, Jessie and her unit rush to rescue Corazon and Rhian. Still unable to locate his hidden contraband, Tiago becomes restless. Running out of options, Gen. Maximillano finally decides to work together with an unlikely ally.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian works hand-in-hand with the military to hunt down Tiago. While doing so, they are also able to rescue his hostages. Tiago eventually comes face-to-face with Rhian despite his attempts to escape the building. In the ensuing struggle, neither party comes out unscathed. Meanwhile, Corazon is beside herself as she prays for her daughter's safety.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Gen. Maximillano takes pride in Tiago's capture. However, the relentless Guerrero patriarch refuses to cooperate with the authorities. With Tiago behind bars, one person from his crew decides to step up. Meanwhile, Rhian hovers between life and death as she undergoes surgery. While their daughter remains in a delicate situation, Corazon and Marcial are on the edge.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Tiago remains firm in his resolve to acquit himself from his alleged crimes. This puts a pressure on Gen. Maximillano and his unit as they struggle to find concrete evidence against him. In Tiago's absence, Franco takes his leadership role seriously. Ivan, on the other hand, starts doubting his loyalty. At the hospital, Rhian finally regains consciousness after recovering from her gunshot wounds.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Tiago pretends to suffer another heart attack in order to get out of prison. Amelia initially worries about her husband's condition before finding out his true plans. Meanwhile, Marcial gets frustrated with Gen. Maximillano as the latter grows lax about Tiago staying in jail for his crimes. Rhian, on the other hand, also doubts her adoptive father's actions. Elsewhere, Franco tries to prove himself worthy of leading the alliance without the general.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian finally faces her crimes as she is brought into prison. Inside, she makes an unexpected connection. Confident in his plans, Tiago remains unbothered by the accusations against him. Meanwhile, Franco tries to gather more information as he continues to hold down the fort for the general. Elsewhere, Jessie and Adalina press on with their investigation on Tiago's connections.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Corazon hounds Tiago and Amelia hoping to catch them in their lies. However, Tiago remains adamant to wriggle his way out of his pending cases. Still behind bars, Rhian receives correspondence from an unexpected source. Meanwhile, Gen. Maximillano faces a tough decision when his team is still unable to find any lead on Tiago. Elsewhere, Ivan finds it more difficult to hide his true colors from Claire.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Aryann is thrown into a vortex of emotions when she learns that she is pregnant with Tristan's child. Unaware of Jenna's plans, Tristan resolves to rebuild his relationship with Aryann.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: As Waldo struggles to find a new job, he meets a lady who he butts heads with. Aryann and Tristan move in together upon learning of their son's condition, while Jenna seeks revenge.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Waldo's hard work pays off when he receives a job offer. Tristan, Aryann, and Rosing fly to the U.S. where their worst fears about the unborn child is confirmed.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Jenna pounces on Tristan's misfortunes. Chesca's safety is put in danger after agreeing to meet with Zach.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Chesca's abductors contact Tristan. Waldo is one step closer to achieving his dreams.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Thanks to Jenna's meddling, Tristan's transaction with the kidnappers fails. To protect his family, Tristan moves Aryann and Angelo somewhere safer. Meanwhile, Waldo deals with office politics.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: While Tristan struggles with Supreme Pacific's scandal, Chesca's kidnapping, and Angelo's worsening condition, the del Mars rejoice as Waldo fulfills his dream of becoming a full-fledged engineer. Soon, Waldo meets his big boss.

programme.title: Once a Princess
programme.desc: Erin Almeda, a member of an all-girl clique consisting of the most glamorous and richest, plays with the innocent heart of resident class geek, Leonard Jamieson. Seven years later, they meet again, this time being Erin's turn to feel the pain.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Romina confronts Daniela about her and Robert's last phone conversation. Carlos becomes worried and tries to settle things with Romina. During an interrogation, Daniela recalls the time when Romina had a serious fight with her father. Later, Bernard reads Robert's last will and testament where Daniela protests upon learning how much Romina and Cassie will inherit.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Due to Daniela's incriminating statements, the investigators zoom in on Romina and invite her to the police station for further questioning. Realizing that she is being framed, Romina changes gears to reclaim her inheritance to properly fight back. Daniela rushes to find ways to clear her name and to take back what she believes is rightfully hers, and discovers a horrifying truth about her father.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Daniela grows determined to protect Robert’s reputation upon learning of his filthy secret and resolves to keep the truth about Cassie’s identity safely hidden. Meanwhile, Romina's hunch about Daniela's involvement on Robert's death intensifies, but cannot find concrete evidence. Unknown to Romina, the culprit behind her husband's demise is on the move of framing her.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Upon learning of Daniela's scheme against the company, Romina arrives at an important decision and is even more determined to find concrete evidence against her stepdaughter. Daniela, on the other hand, resolves to take desperate measures in reclaiming what is rightfully hers. Later, the Mondragons are taken by surprise when the authorities suddenly arrest Romina.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Romina finds herself in a tough spot after learning that she cannot bail herself out of jail. Because of this, Daniela and Marga take advantage of the situation to take over the mansion. They try to drive Cassie out of the manor, but she stands her ground and refuses to leave her home. In order to settle the Mondragon and Bartolome's dispute, Esther tries to knock some sense into Daniela.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Tasked to carry out Robert's wishes, Bernard dissuades Daniela from taking over the mansion. She refuses to budge, but lets Cassie stay on the condition that she will follow all her rules. Daniela then enlists Marga's help in making Cassie regret her decision to fight for her place in the manor. Romina begs her lawyer to get her out of jail so she can protect her daughter from Daniela's wrath.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Determined to take control of the family business, Daniela calls for a company meeting and imposes her own rules. She then threatens to fire anyone who tries to go against her. This rattles the employees of Camila and puts those who remain loyal to Romina in a tight spot. Meanwhile, Romina enlists all the help she can get in order to keep Cassie safe.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Romina finds herself in a tough spot after being transferred to the city jail. Daniela, on the other hand, rejoices that her adversary is already detained. Marga finds a way to keep Cassie from reaching home before her curfew. Esther tries to convince Daniela to go easy on Cassie, but she refuses to heed the nanny's plea and instead gives her a warning.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Cassie asks for Neil's help in order to find a safe place to stay for the night and finds herself facing danger as she wanders outside the mansion. Meanwhile, Hector and Alvin plot to siphon money from Daniela. Romina tries to report the violence she experienced from her fellow inmates.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: As the Alipios rejoice over Jacob's imprisonment, the latter laments on Atty. Balmaceda's incapacity to keep him out of jail. The lawyer proves otherwise by resorting to dirty means to fulfill his client's demand. The move apparently sends Sonya and Jean in utmost disbelief, who are well aware that Jacob has no power to file petition for bail. Meanwhile, Nessa's suspicions pave the way to save Domeng from danger. Elsewhere, Jean gets the chance to finally reunite with her dear Anna.
